1.0.name: wordpress/simple-custom-post-order
1.0.description: Order posts(posts, any custom post types,any taxonomy) using a Drag and Drop Sortable JavaScript. Configuration is unnecessary. You can do directly on default WordPress administration. Excluding custom query which uses order or orderby parameters, in get_posts or query_posts and so on.
